fields.title: Username
fields.description: Username configured for your account to access the Ticketing server from where the connector gets notifications.
fields.name: username

fields.title: API Token
fields.description: Token for the Ticketing server from where the connector gets notifications.
fields.name: token

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.description:
Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.
Defaults to True.
fields.name: verify_ssl

operations.description: Creates a ticket on your configured ticketing tool.

parameters.description: Summary or heading of the ticket that you want to create.

parameters.description: Description of the ticket that you want to create.
parameters.name: ticket_description

parameters.title: Ticket Type
parameters.description: Type of ticket that you want to create.

parameters.tooltip: IT Help, Service Request, Service Request with Approvals, Task, Sub-task

parameters.description: Unique ID that is created for each ticket. Enter the ticket key whose information you want to retrieve.
parameters.name: ticket_id
